title: Mysteryville 2 [English] [PC]
description:
Category: PC

Return to the eye popping fun of Mysteryville in this sequel to one of our most popular games. After solving the cat caper of Mysteryville its time for Laura, ace reporter, to get some well deserved rest. Little does she know shes about to stumble on a mystery even more brain bending than the last! Join Laura on her search for answers through the shops of Eurekaberg where cleverly hidden items are waiting to be found. Featuring fantastic fullscreen graphics, an intriguing storyline, and hours of seek and find fun, Mysteryville 2 is an original adventure for the entire family.
